category_description: Hand-rolled, ethically sourced incense for meditation, clearing, and sensory journeys.

products.name: Palo Santo Sticks
products.description: Wild-harvested from fallen trees in Ecuador. Burns with sweet, woody smoke that clears spaces and centers the mind.
products.tone_hint: Reverent and grounding — emphasize the sacred origins.

products.name: Nag Champa Cones
products.description: The classic temple scent — floral, earthy, and slightly sweet. Hand-rolled in Bangalore.
products.tone_hint: Timeless and meditative — a beloved staple.

products.name: Sage & Cedar Bundle
products.description: White sage and juniper cedar wrapped in cotton twine. Purifies with intention.
products.tone_hint: Ceremonial and intentional — a tool for ritual.

products.name: Lavender Dream Sticks
products.description: French lavender and chamomile on bamboo. Soft, calming, perfect for evening wind-down.
products.tone_hint: Soft and soothing — invoke restful twilight.

products.name: Dragon's Blood Resin
products.description: Deep red resin from Sumatra. Rich, ancient, and protective — best burned on charcoal.
products.tone_hint: Mystical and powerful — a scent for deep work.
